title: [Ta'Illistim, Glimaer Wey]
description: A view of the imposing facade of the Ta'Illistim Bank is visible at the far north end of the wey where Aelis meets Erissian Var.  Birds sing merrily along the quiet tree-lined lane, as sunlight filters through the boughs above.

A view of the imposing facade of the Ta'Illistim Bank is visible at the far north end of the wey where Aelis meets Erissian Var.  Crickets chirp quietly along the quiet tree-lined lane, as moonlight filters through the boughs above.

A view of the imposing facade of the Ta'Illistim Bank is visible past the far north end of the wey, where the Aelis Var meets the Erissian.  The lane is lined with old growth trees, their gnarled boughs laden with flowers and hung with suspended silver lanterns.

A view of the imposing facade of the Ta'Illistim Bank is visible past the far north end of the wey, where the Aelis Var meets the Erissian.  The lane is lined with old growth trees, their gnarled boughs laden with flowers.
paths: Obvious paths: north, east, southwest, northwest
